Class Clinic

java.lang.Object
  Clinic

public class Clinic
extends java.lang.Object

Purpose: Develop the Clinic class that simulates a day at an H1N1 clinic.

Date: 2010 01 23

Author:
M. Ingram

Constructor Summary
Clinic(int time, int nurses, int arriveTime, int vaccTime)
          Constructor for the Clinic class.
 
Method Summary
 void run()
          Simulates the day at the H1N1 clinic, printing off the arrival of citizens, when they begin their vaccination, and when the vaccination is complete.

Constructor Detail

Clinic

public Clinic(int time,
              int nurses,
              int arriveTime,
              int vaccTime)
Constructor for the Clinic class.

Parameters:
time - Length of the day to be simulated.
nurses - Number of nurses working.
arriveTime - Upper limit of citizen arrival time.
vaccTime - Upper limit of citizen vaccination time.
Method Detail

run

public void run()
Simulates the day at the H1N1 clinic, printing off the arrival of citizens, when they begin their vaccination, and when the vaccination is complete.
